channel.title: Project Turris, Hyperion, #377
channel.description:
[size=12pt][i]Welcome to Project Turris Development. This is a hyperion development by `SJ And I, and we plan to have fun, maybe learn some, and make a respectable server. To start out, this is a blank hyperion. This had only what the original hyperion had, so anything you see different is added by us. Here is our update log:
[code] Update - Adam - Ground items is now practically completed. I"m just going to go over and check for any bugs/errors I may have possibly made.
Update - Adam - Added NPC support through XML
Update - Adam - Configured the 2007 login screen
Update 6/11/11 - 1:11 AM: - Worked more on the pickup action class
Update 6/11/11 - 12:38 AM: - Finished a tiles class that checks for an item in the specific region.
Update - Just finished writing most of the picking up stuff. Kieran said he'd finish dropping off for me so I can spend my time doing other stuff .
Update - Kieran - Started shops, started dropping. Floor items done!
Update - Finished a tiles class that checks for an item in the specific region. [/code] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/rlly4g.jpg[/img] [i]
And are adding other things. Some of the many things we are adding will be custom quests. These will have storylines, and affect the gameplay far more than most servers have quests do.
Full skills. Meaning if we do cooking, there will be pies, pizzas, milks, the whole shabang! We are doing this right.
Custom Skills. They will have many other things, whole new types. We will also customize some other skills.
No more shit Runescape economy. We will make the economy based on supply and demand. Much like the real world.
And finally, custom maps. Why not have custom maps, unique areas for our players to explore? I plan on making a map maker much like the rune Fagex uses. That way we can add maps easily, and have updates often.
We do take suggestions, just comment if you have a suggestion. Thank you for reading this. [/i]

item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:15, topic:420606"]Should we turn this into an actual server? Or should we just release it?[/quote]Depends on what you want really.

I’d say turn it into an actual server , many (including me) would play.

item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

If you release I would consider having a good anti-leech so all the noobs don’t get it.

That means don’t delete several brackets because they can easily be found and re-added using eclipse.

item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

[size=12pt][i]Welcome to Project Turris Development. This is a hyperion development by `SJ And I, and we plan to have fun, maybe learn some, and make a respectable server. To start out, this is a blank hyperion. This had only what the original hyperion had, so anything you see different is added by us. Here is our update log:

Update - Adam - Ground items is now practically completed. I"m just going to go over and check for any bugs/errors I may have possibly made.

Update - Adam - Added NPC support through XML

Update - Adam - Configured the 2007 login screen

Update 6/11/11 - 1:11 AM: - Worked more on the pickup action class

Update 6/11/11 - 12:38 AM: - Finished a tiles class that checks for an item in the specific region.

Update - Just finished writing most of the picking up stuff. Kieran said he'd finish dropping off for me so I can spend my time doing other stuff .

Update - Kieran - Started shops, started dropping. Floor items done!

Update - Finished a tiles class that checks for an item in the specific region.

rlly4g.jpg776×532

[i]

And are adding other things.
Some of the many things we are adding will be custom quests. These will have storylines, and affect the gameplay far more than most servers have quests do.

Full skills. Meaning if we do cooking, there will be pies, pizzas, milks, the whole shabang! We are doing this right.

Custom Skills. They will have many other things, whole new types. We will also customize some other skills.

No more shit Runescape economy. We will make the economy based on supply and demand. Much like the real world.

And finally, custom maps. Why not have custom maps, unique areas for our players to explore? I plan on making a map maker much like the rune Fagex uses. That way we can add maps easily, and have updates often.

We do take suggestions, just comment if you have a suggestion. Thank you for reading this. [/i]
